name: Magni's Cake
description:
Magni's Cake

A short fangame where you defend Magni's Cake from magmites and other various threats. 

Can you survive until the boys come over?

How to Play:

Click or hold left mouse button / spacebar to smash enemies before they escape with your cake!

Press Escape to pause the game.

There are options to turn off blood and screenshake if its too much.

Modes:
  • Easy/Normal Mode : Survive for 10 minutes!
  • Endless Mode : Survive as long as possible! 
Credits:

Developer : @Saphertha

BGM:

  •  雨音のワルツ @ フリーBGM DOVA-SYNDROME
  • Boss BGM - Magni Dezmond

SFX:

  • jfxr (8-bit-SFX Creator) by frozenfractal
  • Various Sound Samples from Magni's Stream

Check out Magni Dezmond's channel here!: https://www.youtube.com/@MagniDezmond
